# Clean Unused PIP Packages
## Problem Restatement
Python projects often accumulate unused pip packages over time, which can lead to increased maintenance overhead and potential security vulnerabilities.

## Optimal Solution
Use pip-tools to analyze package usage and safely remove unused dependencies. The process involves: 1) Identifying installed packages, 2) Detecting which packages are actually used in the codebase, 3) Removing unused packages through a controlled process.

## Notes
Always review the unused packages list before removal to avoid breaking dependencies. Consider using virtual environments to isolate project dependencies.
